backend/main.mo: Core backend actor implementing profiles, posts, comments, reactions, moderation state, and access‑controlled queries/mutations using storage and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Defines old/new actor state types and performs a no‑op migration that returns the state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing performance‑related frontend features with associated files, components, tests, and confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries mapping frontend file paths to short descriptions of their purpose and recent changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme variables for light/dark modes and applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with lazy‑loaded pages, theme provider integration, and shared AppLayout/Suspense structure.
frontend/src/components/admin/AuthorName: Component that fetches and displays a username for a principal or falls back to a shortened principal string.
frontend/src/components/admin/FlaggedPos: Displays and manages auto-flagged posts with filtering, sorting, and clearing functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReportedCo: Shows admin view of reported comments, allowing clearing reports or deleting comments.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReportedPo: Provides admin tools to review reported posts and clear reports or delete posts.
frontend/src/components/age/AgeAcknowled: Blocks access to age-gated routes until the user confirms they are 18+.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout, query cache clearing, and age‑gate reset.
frontend/src/components/comments/Comment: Renders a comment with reporting, reactions, and basic author and timestamp info.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with navigation, profile and age gates, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileNav: Mobile slide-out navigation menu showing links based on auth and admin status, with a login button.
frontend/src/components/moderation/Moder: Styled alert component for displaying moderation warnings with an icon and message.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Renders an interactive post card with reactions, reporting, deletion, media handling, and navigation.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileG: Gates content until a logged-in user completes initial profile setup with username and age confirmation.
frontend/src/components/reactions/Reacti: Reaction bar allowing users to select emoji-style reactions with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/state/QueryState: Utility components for loading skeletons, error messages, empty states, and background refresh indicators.
frontend/src/components/state/RouteChunk: Centered loader displayed while route chunks are being dynamically loaded.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendExternalBlo: Converts video ExternalBlob objects into usable URLs, preferring direct links and managing object URL cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendImageUrl.ts: Converts image ExternalBlob objects into usable URLs with direct-link fallback and memory-safe cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns current user identity, auth status, and their profile with loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and AuthClient initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating profiles, posts, comments, guidelines, and related backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and design tokens, defining light/dark theme colors and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Renders an admin-only moderation dashboard with tabs for reported and flagged content.
frontend/src/pages/FactsPage.tsx: Displays a static list of human‑urine‑related facts inside a simple card layout.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Implements the main feed with post creation, media uploads, infinite scrolling, moderation handling, and admin-aware post listing.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the public landing page with hero section, community description, and conditional navigation buttons based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/LoveTheLiquidPage.tsx: Displays a support/donation page with Ko‑fi integration and session‑based thank‑you message handling.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Shows a single post with its comments, supports adding new comments, and includes loading, error, and performance instrumentation logic.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Provides authenticated users a form to view and edit their profile details with save handling and admin indicators.
frontend/src/pages/TipsPage.tsx: Static tips page presenting hydration advice and urine facts using simple cards and lists.
frontend/src/utils/ageGate.ts: Utility for storing and checking age‑acknowledgement state and determining which routes require age confirmation.
frontend/src/utils/flaggedPostsView.ts: Helpers for moderation views, including flag‑reason extraction, text matching, media detection, and timestamp-based sorting.
frontend/src/utils/moderation.ts: Provides helpers for detecting moderation block errors, extracting readable messages, and categorizing error types.
frontend/src/utils/perf.ts: Implements development-only performance markers, measurements, and logs, all no-ops in production.
frontend/src/utils/postImages.ts: Validates image files, converts them to backend blobs, manages preview URLs, and extracts user-friendly error messages.
frontend/src/utils/postVideos.ts: Validates video files, converts them to backend blobs, and handles creation and cleanup of video preview URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, typography, and plugins for the project's design system.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, goals, features, and performance optimization requirements.
